By Group 1: Eswara Lakshmanan Abishek, Jennifer Poernomo, Michelle Leong Hwee-Ling

This project is done for IS415 Geospatial Analytics & Applications 2023, under the guidance of Professor Kam Tin Seong.

The project aims to create an an interactive web application that allows users to carry out **spatial point patterns analysis** easily on forest fire hotspot data from Indonesia.
